snippet: Israel’s military chief said on Tuesday that the army was preparing for a potential influx of refugees into the Golan Heights from Syria.
abstract: Israeli military chief Lt Gen Benny Gants says that the army is preparing for a potential influx of refugees into the Golan Heights from Syria after the failure of Pres Bashar al-Assad's government, which he describes as inevitable.
lead_paragraph: Israel’s military chief said on Tuesday that the army was preparing for a potential influx of refugees into the Golan Heights from Syria.

headline.seo: Israel, Expecting Syrian Collapse, Braces for Refugees
headline.main: Israel, Expecting Syrian Collapse, Braces for Refugees
headline.print_headline: Israel, Expecting Syrian Collapse, Braces for Refugees
